data.text:
If you are looking to improve your conversion rates (who isn’t?), there’s a quick, easy way you can do it: Use power words in your content and headlines to give your conversions a boost.

What are power words? And why do they matter?

In the world of marketing and advertising, power words are persuasive phrases that can trigger emotional responses from your readers. This, in turn, can lead to those valuable conversions you’re seeking right. By focusing on specific words and phrases and utilizing them regularly, you can start to see conversions results sooner and faster than you think.

Here’s how the process works.

Curiosity Leads to Clicks … and Conversions

Words that trigger readers’ engagement through curiosity and interest can be among your most powerful online tools, according to research published by the Harvard Business Review. You’ve probably experienced this phenomenon yourself. Have you ever read a headline or first paragraph that makes it irresistible for you not to click and learn more? Have you ever shared great content with others? If you have, then you already know that power words can do more than merely make your content viral. They can also lead the right prospects and conversions to your business.

Depending on what actions you want your readers to take, you can utilize power words for different goals.

Let’s take a look the three categories for our 100 brilliant power words, which words fall into each one, and why you should be using them to improve conversions right now.

How Power Words Boost Conversion Rates

Marketing research has also shown that power words can elicit specific responses for distinct purposes; for example, to create a sense of wealth (value), impulse (urgency) or improvement(guidance). CapSumo’s recommendations fall into those three categories and can help to guide you.

Wealth Words

Wealth words, just as they imply, promote ideas and images surrounding value. We suggest using these power words when you want to convey the importance of the monetary worth of your products and services to increase your conversions.

Impulse Words

Impulse words invoke an irresistible quality, much like when you are hungry, it’s difficult to resist tempting foods. We recommend using these power words when you want to enthrall your readers and maybe even get them to try out products or services for the first time. They should make your readers want to take a nibble and learn more about your business!

Our third category covers power words that create a sense of ease and improvement, complete tasks for your readers, or provide them with added guidance. We suggest using these power word to stress the quality of your products or services and tell your readers how it can improve the quality of their lives, immediately or even free!

Power Up Your Conversion Rates Today … With Power Words

These are just a few samples of how you, too, can use power words to improve your online business strategies. Power words are easy to use, simple to tweak, and can go a long way getting you the conversion rates you want.
